intro: Psychotria maypurensis, commonly known as the Maypurensis Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Colombia and Ecuador. The plant is characterized by its dense, evergreen foliage and clusters of small, white to greenish-white flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments within the understory of tropical rainforests. Psychotria maypurensis is also noted for its potential ethnobotanical uses, though further research is needed to fully understand its properties.
